title: Azir wall blocking Syndra's E dark sphere projectile
body: As the title says, azir's wall is stoping the dark sphere projectile in its place, much like yasuo's windwall.

replies.body:
Actually, the sphere will still pass through and hit anyone in it's projected path. It just appears to stop on the wall, then gets pushed back. 
Anyhow, this is a bug, and should be fixed for 5.18. Thanks for the report.

{{champion:134}} I am untouchable! (Scatter the Weak on Azir)
{{champion:268}} (is protected by Emperor's Divide) Glory to Shurima.
Do you have a moment to talk about our lord and savior Azir,praise be unto him
might be because here dark sphere's are programmed as  minions
i wanna see what happens when azir ults j4 ult
HAHAHA and they just went to all this trouble trying to fix the bugs with syndra's orbs xD
